grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 腰痛【ヨウツウ】lower back (or hip) pain, lumbago
腰椎【ヨウツイ】lumbar vertebra, lumbar vertebrae
細腰【サイヨウ】slender hips, slim waist
kun reading compounds: 腰【こし】back, lower back, waist, hips, lumbar region, body (of hair, noodle, paper, etc.), resilience, spring
腰掛け【こしかけ】seat, bench, temporary job while looking for a better job or until one marries
お腰【おこし】buttocks, lower back, waist, hips, kimono underskirt
太刀二腰【たちふたこし】two swords
